night.text: It is clearing up. Before midnight in southern part rain and sleet locally. Westerly wind 3-9, on northeastern coast in gusts to 13 m/s. Air temperature falling -1..-6°C, on the windward coast to +2°C. Slippery roads!
night.sea:
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 07:00 UTC Jan 2 to 07:00 UTC Jan 3, 2023.
Weather summary: new Low deepening over Southern Scandinavia and moving over Baltic Sea northeastwards.
No warnings
Northern Baltic: southeast, south 5-10, in gusts 13 m/s, in evening decreasing and becoming east, northeast 3-8 m/s, after midnight northwest increasing 8-13, in gusts 18 m/s. At night wave height 1.5-3 m. At times rain, at night sleet too. Visibility moderate, in sleet poor.
Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: southeast 4-9, in evening in gusts 13 m/s, at night becoming west, northwest and in early morning increasing 9-14, in gusts up to 20 m/s. In afternoon and at night rain and sleet. Visibility moderate, in sleet poor.
Gulf of Finland: southerly 3-8, in afternoon southeast 5-10, in gusts 13 m/s, at night backing east, northeast and increasing 7-12, in gusts up to 17 m/s. At night wave height 1-2 m. In evening in western part rain and sleet starting, at night rain, sleet, snow. Visibility moderate, in precipitation poor.
night.peipsi: Westerly wind 3-8 m/s. Mostly dry. Visibility good to moderate. Air temperature -4..-6°C.

day.text: It is clouding up. In afternoon an area of rain and sleet spreading over Estonia northeastwards, locally snow and freesing rain too. Risk of glaze. Westerly wind backing southeast 3-8, in evening on coast in gusts to 13 m/s. Air temperature rising in Western Estonia 0..+4, in eastern part 0..-3°C.
day.peipsi: Westerly wind in afternoon backing southeast 3-8, in late evening ingusts up to 12 m/s. Mostly dry. Visibility good to moderate. Air temperature -1..-3°C.

night.text: Overcast. Sleet, rain, in northeastern part also snow, towards morning it is going to snow in Central and Northern part of Estonia also. Risk of glaze. Southeast, east 4-10 m/s, backing by morning northerly direction. Air temperature -3..+3°C.

day.text: mainly cloudy. In many places sleet and snow, locally also rain. Mainly northerly 2-8, on islands increasing in gusts to 14 m/s. Air temperature -2..+2°C. Slippery roads!

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Snow in many places. Variable wind 1-6 m/s, on islands northwest 5-10, in gusts to 15 m/s, by the morning decreasing. Air temperature 0..-4, in northeastern part to -7°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Locally some snow. Variable wind 2-8 m/s, by evening turning easterly and somewhat increasing. Air temperature 0..-4, in northeastern part to -7°C.

night.text: Cloudy. Light snow in many places, snowstorm. East, northeast increasing 7-10, in gusts to 14, on islands and coast to 15, in gusts up to 20 m/s. Air temperature -2..-8, in Northern Estonia to -11°C.
